name: Gredler Maria
description:
Dear Guest.  If you are looking for a quiet, trouble free and undisturbed holiday, then you need look no further.
Our private house, built in a Tyrolean style, is situated 1km outside of Mayrhofen, the main towm in Zillertal, in a quiet, but not isolated spot. The "Zillerpromenade", a combined cycle and pedestrian path, and the cross counrty ski trail pass within 200 metres of our house. You can park your car on our private car park, and a separate entrance will lead you through our garden to the terrace of your apartment, which is 70m², where a pleasant seating area and cushioned sun loungers invite you to relax and sunbathe.
Included in price: Heating, water, electricity. Excluded: a final cleaning charge of 40.- Euro.
Directions: Use the B169 until the exit for Horbergbahn/Burgstall. Turn left before the Horberg lifts and drive through Mülbach until you arrive at Burgstall. Our house can be found on the left.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description:
Tyrolean style private house situated in a quiet, but not isolated spot. Car park, garden, seating area. Lounge with integrated kitchen with a traditional tiled stove. Large dining area in a bay window. Wooden stairs leading to the upper floor. 2 bedrooms, each with shower/WC.
The entrance hall leads to a combined lounge/kitchen, which is especially inviting on cold days, with its traditional tiled wood burner. Here you will also find Sat.TV and a stereo system.
For those wishing to try out their cooking skills, the kitchen is fully equipped and has a microwave. Romantic wooden stairs lead you to the upper floor, where you will find 2 bedrooms, each with shower/WC, and a balcony, from where the beautiful surroundings can be enjoyed.
